question: What is the first step when preparing to contribute to the Bitskwela project?

choices.text: Fork the repository and clone your fork locally

question: Before starting work on a contribution, what should you do?

choices.text: Read the CONTRIBUTING.md and check existing issues

question: What makes a good pull request to an open source project?

choices.text: Hundreds of unrelated changes in one PR
A focused change with clear description, following project conventions

question: After your PR is merged, you should sync your fork with upstream.
What did you learn from completing this Git course?

choices.text: Git is a powerful tool for version control and collaboration
